EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for meeting with me
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for taking the time to meet with me. I appreciate the opportunity to learn more about your business, and also speak about the features and benefits that WEX Offers. I just wanted to recap why we are different than many other solutions out there:
Over 30 years of payments industry experience Award-winning 24/7 US-based customer service Over 350,000 customers Features including product type controls, 99.8% Level III Data capture, customized reporting, flexible card types, and much more
I'd welcome the opportunity to get you more information in the coming days. In the meantime, I have a series of industry leading white papers at my disposal, including The Fleet Managers Handbook. Its full of cost saving tips. I can email you a copy if you'd like - just let me know.
Thank you again, and lets keep in touch.
Sincerely,
{!User.Name} | Phone: {!User.Phone}
| Email: {!User.Email}
